forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 44. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Northwest wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 29. West northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs with over a foot of snow since Thursday. Upper loops powertilled and tracked again Monday AM. Mid-winter type conditions should continue through the weekend.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 5 lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be power-tilled and tracked again this morning.
nubsNob.comments: Another three inches of snow landed at Nub's last since yesterday morning. The temperature is forecast to stay just below freezing today and conditions should be very good. The XC trails will also groomed this morning. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
